name: Microsoft WordPad信息泄露漏洞
product: ["Microsoft Windows Server 2008", "Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2", "Microsoft Windows Server 2012 R2", "Microsoft Windows Server 2016", "Microsoft Windows Server 2012", "Microsoft Windows Server 2019", "Microsoft Windows Server 2012", "Microsoft Windows Server 2022", "Microsoft Window 10 22H2", "Microsoft Window 10 21H2", "Microsoft Window 11 22H2", "Microsoft Window 10 1809", "Microsoft Window 10 1607", "Microsoft Window 11 21H2"]
description: Microsoft WordPad是美国微软（Microsoft）公司的一个文字处理器。Microsoft WordPad信息泄露漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2023-36563
patch: Microsoft WordPad信息泄露漏洞的补丁
